fields.name: __**Rule 1: Discord TOS**__
fields.value:
Links to Discord TOS:
> https://discord.com/terms
> https://discord.com/guidelines

> **`1a) `**   All members must be over the age of 13
> **`1b) `**   Selfbots are not allowed
> **`1c) `**   DDoS attacks and DOXXing are not allowed
> **`1d) `**   Dont commit crimes
> **`1z) `**  All other related to Discord TOS
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

fields.name: __**Rule 2: Advertisements and Links**__
fields.value:
> **`2a) `** Do not send links in non-link channels. See **Rule 5**
> **`2b) `** DM advertisement will **NOT** be tolerated and will result in a ban.
> **`2c) `** Do not send any links violating discord terms or guidelines
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

fields.name: __**Rule 3: Flood and Spam**__
fields.value:
> **`3a) `** Do not Flood
> **`3b) `** Do not Spam
> **`3c) `** Do not send the same message in multiple channels
Definitions:
> `Flood:` sending 6+ lines of content from one user
> `Spam:` sending 5+ of the same message in a row
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

fields.name: __**Rule 4: Respect**__
fields.value:
Section 4: Respect
> **`4a) `**  Treat members with basic respect: No death threats, sexism, hate speech, racism, etc.
> **`4b) `**   Do not harass anyone. this is subdivided further:
 > ︱`4b.1 `︱Sexual harassment of anyone results in a **hard ban (see section 0)**
 > ︱`4b.2 `︱Sexual harassment of minors is reported to **Discord and Authorities**
> **`4d) `** Keep Controversial topics in designated channels. see **Rule 5**
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

fields.name: __**Rule 5: Channel Usage**__
fields.value:
> **`5a) `** Please Communicate in English
> **`5b) `** Limit Media used outside of designated channels
> **`5c) `** Read the channel's pinned message and about section, its not that hard.
> **`5d) `** Keep NSFW*content inside of designated channels. **NO EXCEPTIONS.**

fields.name: __**Rule 6: Media**__
fields.value:
> **`5d) `** No NSFW, Gore, or Spam content
> **`5d) `** No Malicious content of any kind
> **`5d) `** All media must follow the channel's rules
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

fields.name: __**Section 0: Definitions**__
fields.value:
`Hard Ban:` a ban with no appeal, where any accounts associated with the user will also be banned with no appeal.
`NSFW:` Typically meaning "not safe for work", in this case applying to any explicit content. this includes audio, visual content, and any related content.
`Content:` Any data, message, or communication
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

footer.text: Rules Template from XCRunnerS on Github
